<b><a href="/wiki/Dutsen_Dala" title="Dutsen Dala">Dutsen Dala</a></b> dutse ne mai tarihi da ke cikin <b><a href="/wiki/Kano_(birni)" title="Kano (birni)">birnin Kano</a></b>, a <b><a href="/wiki/Arewacin_Najeriya" title="Arewacin Najeriya">Arewacin Najeriya</a></b>. Wannan dutse ya shahara ne wajen kasancewa wurin ibada da zaman gargajiya kafin zuwan addinin <b><a href="/wiki/Musulunci" title="Musulunci">Musulunci</a></b> a yankin. Har ila yau, yana daga cikin wuraren tarihi da aladu da ake danganta da kafa masarautar Kano.</div></div>

<div style="margin: 3px 1px 4px 1px; padding: 5px; text-align:center; border-style: solid; border:1px solid #0000FF;"><b>A wasu ranaku</b><br><div class="hlist hlist-separated" style="font-size: 85%;">

<p><b>Yau 4 ga Oktoba na 2025</b>
Ga wasu muhimman abubuwa na tarihi da suka faru a wannan rana.
</p>
<ul><li>1582: An fara aiwatar da Kalandar Gregorian a kasashe da dama na Turai.</li>
<li>1824: Kyaftin Lord Byron ya isa asar Girka domin taimaka wa 'yan gwagwarmaya a yain neman 'yancin kai.</li>
<li>1883: An kafa ungiyar <b>Orient Express</b> wadda ta fara jigilar jirgin kasa daga Paris zuwa Istanbul.</li>
<li>1957: An kaddamar da <b>Sputnik 1</b> ta Tarayyar Soviet, tauraron dan adam na farko a duniya.</li>
<li>1966: Lesotho ta samu 'yancin kai daga Birtaniya.</li>
<li>1985: <b>Free Software Foundation (FSF)</b> ta fara aiki karkashin jagorancin Richard Stallman.</li>
<li>1993: Rundunar Amurka ta yi faduwar jirgi a <b><a href="/wiki/Mogadishu" title="Mogadishu">Mogadishu</a></b>, <b><a href="/wiki/Somaliya" title="Somaliya">Somaliya</a></b> (wanda aka fi sani da Black Hawk Down).</li>
<li>2004: Taaddanci ya faru a Samarra, <b><a href="/wiki/Iraki" class="mw-redirect" title="Iraki">Iraki</a></b>, wanda ya jawo mutuwar mutane da dama.</li>
<li>2011: Rundunar NATO ta kammala yain cikin gida a <b><a href="/wiki/Libya" title="Libya">Libya</a></b> bayan kifar da gwamnatin Muammar Gaddafi.</li></ul>
<div id="mf-otd" title="Rana a tarihi 25 Oktoba"></div>
</td></tr>

<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Benin_City" class="mw-redirect" title="Benin City">Birnin Benin</a></b> ta kasance cibiyar masarautar Benin wadda ta yi fice da zane-zanen tagulla?</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Kogin_Neja" class="mw-redirect" title="Kogin Neja">Kogin Neja</a></b> yana zagaye siffar baka kafin ya zubo a Tekun Guinea?</li>
<li><b>Wakokin bori</b> na da tasiri sosai a tarihin kia da al'adun Hausawa?</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Lagos" title="Lagos">Lagos</a></b> ita ce birni mafi girma a Najeriya da kuma daya daga cikin mafi cunkoso a duniya?</li>
<li>A <b><a href="/wiki/Chad" class="mw-redirect" title="Chad">Chad</a></b>, tafkin Chadi yana raguwa da sauri sakamakon dumamar yanayi?</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Arewacin_Najeriya" title="Arewacin Najeriya">Arewacin Najeriya</a></b> na da wuraren tarihi da dama irin su Birnin Zaria da Birnin Kano?</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Gidan_Rumfa" title="Gidan Rumfa">Gidan Rumfa</a></b> a <b><a href="/wiki/Kano_(birni)" title="Kano (birni)">Kano</a></b> an gina shi tun karni na 15 kuma yana daya daga cikin tsofaffin fadodi a Afirka?</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Musulunci" title="Musulunci">Addinin Islama</a></b> ya fara shigowa Najeriya ne ta hanyar kasuwanci a Arewaci tun karni na 11?</li>
<li><b>Gibraaltar</b> wuri ne mai matuar muhimmanci tsakanin <b><a href="/wiki/Turai" title="Turai">Turai</a></b> da Afirka saboda matsayinsa na hanya?</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Mali" title="Mali">Mali</a></b> da Songhai sun taba zama daular musulunci masu karfi a yammacin Afirka?</li></ul></div>

<div style="margin: 3px 1px 4px 1px; padding: 5px; text-align:left; border-style: solid; border:1px solid #000080;">
<ul><li><b>Ambaliya a Najeriya</b>: Ambaliyar ruwan sama mai arfi ta shafi jihohi 30 da kuma FCT; mutane sama da dubban sun rasa matsugunni, kuma daruruwan mutane sun rasa rayukansu.</li>
<li><b>Ambaliya a <a href="/wiki/Adamawa" title="Adamawa">Adamawa</a></b>: Akwai rahotanni cewa yankuna da dama a garuruwan Yola-North da Yola-South an yi aura don gujewa ambaliyar ruwa.</li>
<li><b>Halin Tsaro da Rikici a Sudan</b>: Aalla mutane da dama sun mutu a garin El-Fasher sakamakon harin RSF, waanda suka yi amfani da bindigogi masu linzami da naurorin tashi sama.</li>
<li><b>Rikicin Tsakanin <a href="/w/index.php?title=Sojojin_a_Sudan&action=edit&redlink=1" class="new" title="Sojojin a Sudan (babu wannan shafin)">Sojojin a Sudan</a></b>: Rundunar asar ta bayyana cewa sun yi nasarar kashe wasu mayaa a kusa da El-Fasher yayin fafatawa da RSF.</li>
<li><b>ungiyoyin Jamaa a Sudan</b>: Kungiyoyin fararen hula daga Sudan suna shirin hauwa a Addis Ababa karkashin kulawar taron Afirka domin tattaunawa kan zaman lafiya da shugabancin asa.</li>
<li><b>Yanayi Mai Tsanani a Darfur</b>: Hukumar Majalisar inkin Duniya ta yi gargadi game da matsanancin yanayin jinai a Darfur, inda dubban mutane ke zaman zango ba tare da samun isasshen taimako ba.</li></ul>

    Ku kirkiri account domain taimaka ma Hausa Wikipedia. Kirkirar account kyauta ne. Idan kuma neman taimako ku tambaya a nan.

      Daga Wikipedia, Insakulofidiya ta kyauta.
      Barka da zuwa Wikipedia ta Hausa
      Insakulofidiya ta kyauta wacce kowa zai iya gyarawa.
      Mukaloli 71,410 a cikin Harshen Hausa
      • Adabi
      • Tarihin mutane
      • Addini
      • Tarihi
      • Lissafi

      • Zamantakewa

      • Dukkannin ofofi
      Mualar mu a yau
      Dutsen Dala dutse ne mai tarihi da ke cikin birnin Kano, a Arewacin Najeriya. Wannan dutse ya shahara ne wajen kasancewa wurin ibada da zaman gargajiya kafin zuwan addinin Musulunci a yankin. Har ila yau, yana daga cikin wuraren tarihi da aladu da ake danganta da kafa masarautar Kano.
      A rana irin ta yau
      A wasu ranaku
      • Usman dan Fodio
      • Hijirar Annabi
      • Ranan Salla

      Yau 4 ga Oktoba na 2025 Ga wasu muhimman abubuwa na tarihi da suka faru a wannan rana.

      • 1582: An fara aiwatar da Kalandar Gregorian a kasashe da dama na Turai.
      • 1824: Kyaftin Lord Byron ya isa asar Girka domin taimaka wa 'yan gwagwarmaya a yain neman 'yancin kai.
      • 1883: An kafa ungiyar Orient Express wadda ta fara jigilar jirgin kasa daga Paris zuwa Istanbul.
      • 1957: An kaddamar da Sputnik 1 ta Tarayyar Soviet, tauraron dan adam na farko a duniya.
      • 1966: Lesotho ta samu 'yancin kai daga Birtaniya.
      • 1985: Free Software Foundation (FSF) ta fara aiki karkashin jagorancin Richard Stallman.
      • 1993: Rundunar Amurka ta yi faduwar jirgi a Mogadishu, Somaliya (wanda aka fi sani da Black Hawk Down).
      • 2004: Taaddanci ya faru a Samarra, Iraki, wanda ya jawo mutuwar mutane da dama.
      • 2011: Rundunar NATO ta kammala yain cikin gida a Libya bayan kifar da gwamnatin Muammar Gaddafi.
      Ko kun san...?
      Ko ka san bangarorin nan
      • Shin ko ka san Addinai
      • Shin ko ka san Al'adu
      • Shin ko ka san Ilimi
      • Birnin Benin ta kasance cibiyar masarautar Benin wadda ta yi fice da zane-zanen tagulla?
      • Kogin Neja yana zagaye siffar baka kafin ya zubo a Tekun Guinea?
      • Wakokin bori na da tasiri sosai a tarihin kia da al'adun Hausawa?
      • Lagos ita ce birni mafi girma a Najeriya da kuma daya daga cikin mafi cunkoso a duniya?
      • A Chad, tafkin Chadi yana raguwa da sauri sakamakon dumamar yanayi?
      • Arewacin Najeriya na da wuraren tarihi da dama irin su Birnin Zaria da Birnin Kano?
      • Gidan Rumfa a Kano an gina shi tun karni na 15 kuma yana daya daga cikin tsofaffin fadodi a Afirka?
      • Addinin Islama ya fara shigowa Najeriya ne ta hanyar kasuwanci a Arewaci tun karni na 11?
      • Gibraaltar wuri ne mai matuar muhimmanci tsakanin Turai da Afirka saboda matsayinsa na hanya?
      • Mali da Songhai sun taba zama daular musulunci masu karfi a yammacin Afirka?
      Kanun labarai
      Shafukan da ake bukatar a ara inganta su
      • Kofi Annan
      • Abubakar Adam Ibrahim
      • Sam Adekugbe
      • Thomas Sankara
      • Daurama
      • Kabara
      • Patrice Lumumba
      • Maguzawa
      • Gaskiya Ta Fi Kwabo
      • Barikanchi Pidgin
      • Ajami
      • Baiko
      • Nigerian braille
      • Hausa Bakwai
      • Ambaliya a Najeriya: Ambaliyar ruwan sama mai arfi ta shafi jihohi 30 da kuma FCT; mutane sama da dubban sun rasa matsugunni, kuma daruruwan mutane sun rasa rayukansu.
      • Ambaliya a Adamawa: Akwai rahotanni cewa yankuna da dama a garuruwan Yola-North da Yola-South an yi aura don gujewa ambaliyar ruwa.
      • Halin Tsaro da Rikici a Sudan: Aalla mutane da dama sun mutu a garin El-Fasher sakamakon harin RSF, waanda suka yi amfani da bindigogi masu linzami da naurorin tashi sama.
      • Rikicin Tsakanin Sojojin a Sudan: Rundunar asar ta bayyana cewa sun yi nasarar kashe wasu mayaa a kusa da El-Fasher yayin fafatawa da RSF.
      • ungiyoyin Jamaa a Sudan: Kungiyoyin fararen hula daga Sudan suna shirin hauwa a Addis Ababa karkashin kulawar taron Afirka domin tattaunawa kan zaman lafiya da shugabancin asa.
      • Yanayi Mai Tsanani a Darfur: Hukumar Majalisar inkin Duniya ta yi gargadi game da matsanancin yanayin jinai a Darfur, inda dubban mutane ke zaman zango ba tare da samun isasshen taimako ba.
      Zaka iya duba babban shafin English Wikipedia

Mukaloli 71,410 a cikin Harshen Hausa
  • Adabi

Mualar mu a yau
Dutsen Dala dutse ne mai tarihi da ke cikin birnin Kano, a Arewacin Najeriya. Wannan dutse ya shahara ne wajen kasancewa wurin ibada da zaman gargajiya kafin zuwan addinin Musulunci a yankin. Har ila yau, yana daga cikin wuraren tarihi da aladu da ake danganta da kafa masarautar Kano.
A rana irin ta yau
A wasu ranaku
  • Usman dan Fodio
  • Hijirar Annabi
  • Ranan Salla

Yau 4 ga Oktoba na 2025 Ga wasu muhimman abubuwa na tarihi da suka faru a wannan rana.

  • 1582: An fara aiwatar da Kalandar Gregorian a kasashe da dama na Turai.
  • 1824: Kyaftin Lord Byron ya isa asar Girka domin taimaka wa 'yan gwagwarmaya a yain neman 'yancin kai.
  • 1883: An kafa ungiyar Orient Express wadda ta fara jigilar jirgin kasa daga Paris zuwa Istanbul.
  • 1957: An kaddamar da Sputnik 1 ta Tarayyar Soviet, tauraron dan adam na farko a duniya.
  • 1966: Lesotho ta samu 'yancin kai daga Birtaniya.
  • 1985: Free Software Foundation (FSF) ta fara aiki karkashin jagorancin Richard Stallman.
  • 1993: Rundunar Amurka ta yi faduwar jirgi a Mogadishu, Somaliya (wanda aka fi sani da Black Hawk Down).
  • 2004: Taaddanci ya faru a Samarra, Iraki, wanda ya jawo mutuwar mutane da dama.
  • 2011: Rundunar NATO ta kammala yain cikin gida a Libya bayan kifar da gwamnatin Muammar Gaddafi.
Ko kun san...?
Ko ka san bangarorin nan
  • Shin ko ka san Addinai
  • Shin ko ka san Al'adu
  • Shin ko ka san Ilimi
  • Birnin Benin ta kasance cibiyar masarautar Benin wadda ta yi fice da zane-zanen tagulla?
  • Kogin Neja yana zagaye siffar baka kafin ya zubo a Tekun Guinea?
  • Wakokin bori na da tasiri sosai a tarihin kia da al'adun Hausawa?
  • Lagos ita ce birni mafi girma a Najeriya da kuma daya daga cikin mafi cunkoso a duniya?
  • A Chad, tafkin Chadi yana raguwa da sauri sakamakon dumamar yanayi?
  • Arewacin Najeriya na da wuraren tarihi da dama irin su Birnin Zaria da Birnin Kano?
  • Gidan Rumfa a Kano an gina shi tun karni na 15 kuma yana daya daga cikin tsofaffin fadodi a Afirka?
  • Addinin Islama ya fara shigowa Najeriya ne ta hanyar kasuwanci a Arewaci tun karni na 11?
  • Gibraaltar wuri ne mai matuar muhimmanci tsakanin Turai da Afirka saboda matsayinsa na hanya?
  • Mali da Songhai sun taba zama daular musulunci masu karfi a yammacin Afirka?
Kanun labarai
Shafukan da ake bukatar a ara inganta su
  • Kofi Annan
  • Abubakar Adam Ibrahim
  • Sam Adekugbe
  • Thomas Sankara
  • Daurama
  • Kabara
  • Patrice Lumumba
  • Maguzawa
  • Gaskiya Ta Fi Kwabo
  • Barikanchi Pidgin
  • Ajami
  • Baiko
  • Nigerian braille
  • Hausa Bakwai
  • Ambaliya a Najeriya: Ambaliyar ruwan sama mai arfi ta shafi jihohi 30 da kuma FCT; mutane sama da dubban sun rasa matsugunni, kuma daruruwan mutane sun rasa rayukansu.
  • Ambaliya a Adamawa: Akwai rahotanni cewa yankuna da dama a garuruwan Yola-North da Yola-South an yi aura don gujewa ambaliyar ruwa.
  • Halin Tsaro da Rikici a Sudan: Aalla mutane da dama sun mutu a garin El-Fasher sakamakon harin RSF, waanda suka yi amfani da bindigogi masu linzami da naurorin tashi sama.
  • Rikicin Tsakanin Sojojin a Sudan: Rundunar asar ta bayyana cewa sun yi nasarar kashe wasu mayaa a kusa da El-Fasher yayin fafatawa da RSF.
  • ungiyoyin Jamaa a Sudan: Kungiyoyin fararen hula daga Sudan suna shirin hauwa a Addis Ababa karkashin kulawar taron Afirka domin tattaunawa kan zaman lafiya da shugabancin asa.
  • Yanayi Mai Tsanani a Darfur: Hukumar Majalisar inkin Duniya ta yi gargadi game da matsanancin yanayin jinai a Darfur, inda dubban mutane ke zaman zango ba tare da samun isasshen taimako ba.

Dutsen Dala
Dutsen Dala dutse ne mai tarihi da ke cikin birnin Kano, a Arewacin Najeriya. Wannan dutse ya shahara ne wajen kasancewa wurin ibada da zaman gargajiya kafin zuwan addinin Musulunci a yankin. Har ila yau, yana daga cikin wuraren tarihi da aladu da ake danganta da kafa masarautar Kano.

A wasu ranaku
Usman dan Fodio
Hijirar Annabi
Ranan Salla
 
Yau 4 ga Oktoba na 2025
Ga wasu muhimman abubuwa na tarihi da suka faru a wannan rana.

1582: An fara aiwatar da Kalandar Gregorian a kasashe da dama na Turai.
1824: Kyaftin Lord Byron ya isa asar Girka domin taimaka wa 'yan gwagwarmaya a yain neman 'yancin kai.
1883: An kafa ungiyar Orient Express wadda ta fara jigilar jirgin kasa daga Paris zuwa Istanbul.
1957: An kaddamar da Sputnik 1 ta Tarayyar Soviet, tauraron dan adam na farko a duniya.
1966: Lesotho ta samu 'yancin kai daga Birtaniya.
1985: Free Software Foundation (FSF) ta fara aiki karkashin jagorancin Richard Stallman.
1993: Rundunar Amurka ta yi faduwar jirgi a Mogadishu, Somaliya (wanda aka fi sani da Black Hawk Down).
2004: Taaddanci ya faru a Samarra, Iraki, wanda ya jawo mutuwar mutane da dama.
2011: Rundunar NATO ta kammala yain cikin gida a Libya bayan kifar da gwamnatin Muammar Gaddafi.

A Chad, tafkin Chadi yana raguwa da sauri sakamakon dumamar yanayi?
Arewacin Najeriya na da wuraren tarihi da dama irin su Birnin Zaria da Birnin Kano?

Daga Wikipedia, Insakulofidiya ta kyauta.
Barka da zuwa [Wikipedia ta Hausa](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia "Wikipedia")
[Insakulofidiya](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insakulofidiya "Insakulofidiya") ta kyauta [wacce kowa zai iya gyarawa](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Gabatarwa "Wikipedia:Gabatarwa").
Mukaloli **[71,410](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Musamman:Statistics "Musamman:Statistics")** a cikin [Harshen Hausa](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harshen_Hausa "Harshen Hausa")

---  
[![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/2e/Dala_Hill_in_Dala_Town.jpg/330px-Dala_Hill_in_Dala_Town.jpg)](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fayil:Dala_Hill_in_Dala_Town.jpg)Dutsen Dala **[Dutsen Dala](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dutsen_Dala "Dutsen Dala")** dutse ne mai tarihi da ke cikin **[birnin Kano](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kano_\(birni\) "Kano \(birni\)")** , a **[Arewacin Najeriya](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arewacin_Najeriya "Arewacin Najeriya")**. Wannan dutse ya shahara ne wajen kasancewa wurin ibada da zaman gargajiya kafin zuwan addinin **[Musulunci](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Musulunci "Musulunci")** a yankin. Har ila yau, yana daga cikin wuraren tarihi da aladu da ake danganta da kafa masarautar Kano.  
![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/9/90/Wbar_green2.jpg) [![Wikipedia:A rana irin ta yau 25 Oktoba](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d4/Nuvola_apps_date.png/20px-Nuvola_apps_date.png)](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/25_Oktoba "Wikipedia:A rana irin ta yau 25 Oktoba") **A rana irin ta yau**  
**A wasu ranaku**  

  * [Usman dan Fodio](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Usman_dan_Fodio "Usman dan Fodio")
  * [Hijirar Annabi](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hijira "Hijira")
  * [Ranan Salla](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ranan_Salla "Ranan Salla")

**Yau 4 ga Oktoba na 2025** Ga wasu muhimman abubuwa na tarihi da suka faru a wannan rana. 
  * 1582: An fara aiwatar da Kalandar Gregorian a kasashe da dama na Turai.
  * 1824: Kyaftin Lord Byron ya isa asar Girka domin taimaka wa 'yan gwagwarmaya a yain neman 'yancin kai.
  * 1883: An kafa ungiyar **Orient Express** wadda ta fara jigilar jirgin kasa daga Paris zuwa Istanbul.
  * 1957: An kaddamar da **Sputnik 1** ta Tarayyar Soviet, tauraron dan adam na farko a duniya.
  * 1966: Lesotho ta samu 'yancin kai daga Birtaniya.
  * 1985: **Free Software Foundation (FSF)** ta fara aiki karkashin jagorancin Richard Stallman.
  * 1993: Rundunar Amurka ta yi faduwar jirgi a **[Mogadishu](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mogadishu "Mogadishu")** , **[Somaliya](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Somaliya "Somaliya")** (wanda aka fi sani da Black Hawk Down).
  * 2004: Taaddanci ya faru a Samarra, **[Iraki](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Iraki "Iraki")** , wanda ya jawo mutuwar mutane da dama.
  * 2011: Rundunar NATO ta kammala yain cikin gida a **[Libya](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Libya "Libya")** bayan kifar da gwamnatin Muammar Gaddafi.

  
![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/e/e9/Wbar_green3.jpg) ![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/44/Nuvola_apps_filetypes.svg/40px-Nuvola_apps_filetypes.svg.png) **Ko kun san...?**  
**Ko ka san bangarorin nan**  

  * [Shin ko ka san Addinai](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jerin_Addinai "Jerin Addinai") [![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/65/ReligiousSymbols.png/40px-ReligiousSymbols.png)](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fayil:ReligiousSymbols.png)
  * [Shin ko ka san Al'adu](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shin_ko_ka_san_Al%27adu "Shin ko ka san Al'adu") [![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/7e/Globe-Star_of_life.svg/40px-Globe-Star_of_life.svg.png)](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fayil:Globe-Star_of_life.svg)
  * [Shin ko ka san Ilimi](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shin_ko_ka_san_Ilimi "Shin ko ka san Ilimi") [![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/32/Books-aj.svg_aj_ashton_01f.svg/40px-Books-aj.svg_aj_ashton_01f.svg.png)](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fayil:Books-aj.svg_aj_ashton_01f.svg)


  * **[Birnin Benin](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Benin_City "Benin City")** ta kasance cibiyar masarautar Benin wadda ta yi fice da zane-zanen tagulla?
  * **[Kogin Neja](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kogin_Neja "Kogin Neja")** yana zagaye siffar baka kafin ya zubo a Tekun Guinea?
  * **Wakokin bori** na da tasiri sosai a tarihin kia da al'adun Hausawa?
  * **[Lagos](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lagos "Lagos")** ita ce birni mafi girma a Najeriya da kuma daya daga cikin mafi cunkoso a duniya?
  * A **[Chad](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chad "Chad")** , tafkin Chadi yana raguwa da sauri sakamakon dumamar yanayi?
  * **[Arewacin Najeriya](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arewacin_Najeriya "Arewacin Najeriya")** na da wuraren tarihi da dama irin su Birnin Zaria da Birnin Kano?
  * **[Gidan Rumfa](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gidan_Rumfa "Gidan Rumfa")** a **[Kano](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kano_\(birni\) "Kano \(birni\)")** an gina shi tun karni na 15 kuma yana daya daga cikin tsofaffin fadodi a Afirka?
  * **[Addinin Islama](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Musulunci "Musulunci")** ya fara shigowa Najeriya ne ta hanyar kasuwanci a Arewaci tun karni na 11?
  * **Gibraaltar** wuri ne mai matuar muhimmanci tsakanin **[Turai](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turai "Turai")** da Afirka saboda matsayinsa na hanya?
  * **[Mali](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mali "Mali")** da Songhai sun taba zama daular musulunci masu karfi a yammacin Afirka?

**Shafukan da ake bukatar a ara inganta su**  

  * [Kofi Annan](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kofi_Annan "Kofi Annan")
  * [Abubakar Adam Ibrahim](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abubakar_Adam_Ibrahim "Abubakar Adam Ibrahim")
  * [Sam Adekugbe](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sam_Adekugbe "Sam Adekugbe")

  * [Daurama](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Daurama "Daurama")
  * [Kabara](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kabara "Kabara")
  * [Patrice Lumumba](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Patrice_Lumumba "Patrice Lumumba")
  * [Maguzawa](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maguzawa "Maguzawa")
  * [Gaskiya Ta Fi Kwabo](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gaskiya_Ta_Fi_Kwabo "Gaskiya Ta Fi Kwabo")
  * [Barikanchi Pidgin](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barikanchi_Pidgin "Barikanchi Pidgin")
  * [Ajami](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ajami "Ajami")
  * [Baiko](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baiko "Baiko")
  * [Nigerian braille](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nigerian_braille "Nigerian braille")
  * [Hausa Bakwai](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hausa_Bakwai "Hausa Bakwai")


  * **Ambaliya a Najeriya** : Ambaliyar ruwan sama mai arfi ta shafi jihohi 30 da kuma FCT; mutane sama da dubban sun rasa matsugunni, kuma daruruwan mutane sun rasa rayukansu.
  * **Ambaliya a[Adamawa](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adamawa "Adamawa")**: Akwai rahotanni cewa yankuna da dama a garuruwan Yola-North da Yola-South an yi aura don gujewa ambaliyar ruwa.
  * **Halin Tsaro da Rikici a Sudan** : Aalla mutane da dama sun mutu a garin El-Fasher sakamakon harin RSF, waanda suka yi amfani da bindigogi masu linzami da naurorin tashi sama.
  * **Rikicin Tsakanin[Sojojin a Sudan](https://ha.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Sojojin_a_Sudan&action=edit&redlink=1 "Sojojin a Sudan \(babu wannan shafin\)")**: Rundunar asar ta bayyana cewa sun yi nasarar kashe wasu mayaa a kusa da El-Fasher yayin fafatawa da RSF.
  * **ungiyoyin Jamaa a Sudan** : Kungiyoyin fararen hula daga Sudan suna shirin hauwa a Addis Ababa karkashin kulawar taron Afirka domin tattaunawa kan zaman lafiya da shugabancin asa.
  * **Yanayi Mai Tsanani a Darfur** : Hukumar Majalisar inkin Duniya ta yi gargadi game da matsanancin yanayin jinai a Darfur, inda dubban mutane ke zaman zango ba tare da samun isasshen taimako ba.

|  ![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/4/46/Wbar_blue.jpg) ![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/c/c1/Star_Ouro_8bits.png) **Mualar mu a yau58**  
---  
![59](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fayil:Dala_Hill_in_Dala_Town.jpg)Dutsen Dala **Dutsen Dala60** dutse ne mai tarihi da ke cikin **birnin Kano61 "Kano \(birni\)")** , a **Arewacin Najeriya62**. Wannan dutse ya shahara ne wajen kasancewa wurin ibada da zaman gargajiya kafin zuwan addinin **Musulunci63** a yankin. Har ila yau, yana daga cikin wuraren tarihi da aladu da ake danganta da kafa masarautar Kano.  
![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/9/90/Wbar_green2.jpg) ![Wikipedia:A rana irin ta yau 25 Oktoba64](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/25_Oktoba "Wikipedia:A rana irin ta yau 25 Oktoba") **A rana irin ta yau**  
**A wasu ranaku**  

  * Usman dan Fodio65
  * Hijirar Annabi66
  * Ranan Salla67

**Yau 4 ga Oktoba na 2025** Ga wasu muhimman abubuwa na tarihi da suka faru a wannan rana. 
  * 1582: An fara aiwatar da Kalandar Gregorian a kasashe da dama na Turai.
  * 1824: Kyaftin Lord Byron ya isa asar Girka domin taimaka wa 'yan gwagwarmaya a yain neman 'yancin kai.
  * 1883: An kafa ungiyar **Orient Express** wadda ta fara jigilar jirgin kasa daga Paris zuwa Istanbul.
  * 1957: An kaddamar da **Sputnik 1** ta Tarayyar Soviet, tauraron dan adam na farko a duniya.
  * 1966: Lesotho ta samu 'yancin kai daga Birtaniya.
  * 1985: **Free Software Foundation (FSF)** ta fara aiki karkashin jagorancin Richard Stallman.
  * 1993: Rundunar Amurka ta yi faduwar jirgi a **Mogadishu68** , **Somaliya69** (wanda aka fi sani da Black Hawk Down).
  * 2004: Taaddanci ya faru a Samarra, **Iraki70** , wanda ya jawo mutuwar mutane da dama.
  * 2011: Rundunar NATO ta kammala yain cikin gida a **Libya71** bayan kifar da gwamnatin Muammar Gaddafi.

  
![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/e/e9/Wbar_green3.jpg) ![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/44/Nuvola_apps_filetypes.svg/40px-Nuvola_apps_filetypes.svg.png) **Ko kun san...?**  
**Ko ka san bangarorin nan**  

  * Shin ko ka san Addinai72 ![73](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fayil:ReligiousSymbols.png)
  * Shin ko ka san Al'adu74 ![75](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fayil:Globe-Star_of_life.svg)
  * Shin ko ka san Ilimi76 ![77](https://ha.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fayil:Books-aj.svg_aj_ashton_01f.svg)


  * **Birnin Benin78** ta kasance cibiyar masarautar Benin wadda ta yi fice da zane-zanen tagulla?
  * **Kogin Neja79** yana zagaye siffar baka kafin ya zubo a Tekun Guinea?
  * **Wakokin bori** na da tasiri sosai a tarihin kia da al'adun Hausawa?
  * **Lagos80** ita ce birni mafi girma a Najeriya da kuma daya daga cikin mafi cunkoso a duniya?
  * A **Chad81** , tafkin Chadi yana raguwa da sauri sakamakon dumamar yanayi?
  * **Arewacin Najeriya62** na da wuraren tarihi da dama irin su Birnin Zaria da Birnin Kano?
  * **Gidan Rumfa82** a **Kano61 "Kano \(birni\)")** an gina shi tun karni na 15 kuma yana daya daga cikin tsofaffin fadodi a Afirka?
  * **Addinin Islama63** ya fara shigowa Najeriya ne ta hanyar kasuwanci a Arewaci tun karni na 11?
  * **Gibraaltar** wuri ne mai matuar muhimmanci tsakanin **Turai83** da Afirka saboda matsayinsa na hanya?
  * **Mali84** da Songhai sun taba zama daular musulunci masu karfi a yammacin Afirka?

  * **Ambaliya a Najeriya** : Ambaliyar ruwan sama mai arfi ta shafi jihohi 30 da kuma FCT; mutane sama da dubban sun rasa matsugunni, kuma daruruwan mutane sun rasa rayukansu.
  * **Ambaliya aAdamawa100**: Akwai rahotanni cewa yankuna da dama a garuruwan Yola-North da Yola-South an yi aura don gujewa ambaliyar ruwa.
  * **Halin Tsaro da Rikici a Sudan** : Aalla mutane da dama sun mutu a garin El-Fasher sakamakon harin RSF, waanda suka yi amfani da bindigogi masu linzami da naurorin tashi sama.
  * **Rikicin TsakaninSojojin a Sudan101**: Rundunar asar ta bayyana cewa sun yi nasarar kashe wasu mayaa a kusa da El-Fasher yayin fafatawa da RSF.
  * **ungiyoyin Jamaa a Sudan** : Kungiyoyin fararen hula daga Sudan suna shirin hauwa a Addis Ababa karkashin kulawar taron Afirka domin tattaunawa kan zaman lafiya da shugabancin asa.
  * **Yanayi Mai Tsanani a Darfur** : Hukumar Majalisar inkin Duniya ta yi gargadi game da matsanancin yanayin jinai a Darfur, inda dubban mutane ke zaman zango ba tare da samun isasshen taimako ba.
